amendment.description: Amendment reduces the Department of Energy administration account by $35 million and increases the Global Threat Reduction Initiative account by a similar amount.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to reduce the Departmental Administration account under the Department of Energy by $35 million and increase the Defense Nuclear Nonproliferation account by the same amount.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Fortenberry amendment (A045) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Fortenberry amendment (A045) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A045) offered by Mr. Fortenberry.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
